name: The Moon (PAPRPL8)
description:
There is only one level and you can use A and D allow you to move. 

Second jam and unfortunately I didn't have a lot of time to this go around. Conflicting priorities with my day job and stress prevented me from spending as much time as I had hoped.

I followed LucyLavend's tutorial for the rover and used SmartShape2D for the terrain. Music and art background by Adam Whitford. I spent a lot of time this go around messing with pixel art. I used Aseprite which made the creation of the assets a lot easier than Gimp. Highly recommend Aseprite! Was a real life saver.
